item.description:
Hi All,

I have scheduled PartyExpress to go to the Mansion in New Haven. Abe Lincoln stayed in this mansion, and it has a lot of history. The meetup will start at 7 pm. There is going to be a free buffet, 2 dollar beers, and 3 dollar mixed drinks. Their will also be a tour of the place during the band breaks for us. If you need directions, CLICK HERE.

This is going to be an atmosphere to talk, meet new people, and see some history, along with some good tunes from the house band, Robbie G.

Here is the local map to get there and which mansion it is. I recommend printing this out. Notice the entrance is really on Clifton Street.

I would like to shoot for from 30 to 100 or more people showing up, so we could take advantage of the specials. I will give them a final count friday morning.

If you get lost, please call Steve for info....203-987-8168.

Steve C.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be meeting up in the Bar Area.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: PartyExpress Goes to the Mansion in New Haven
